game.name: Library Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Build your own library from scratch; place shelves, organize books, welcome visitors, and register new members. Manage subscription plans, customize your layout, and turn this quiet space into a book-filled success story!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build your own library from scratch; place shelves, organize books, welcome visitors, and register new members. Manage subscription plans, customize your layout, and turn this quiet space into a book-filled success story!
